35BN.F.summary: Morien Resources Corp., a mining development company, engages in the identification and purchase of mineral properties in Canada. The company holds royalty interests in the Donkin coal mine located in Cape Breton, Nova Scotia; and the Black Point aggregate project located in Guysborough County, Nova Scotia. Morien Resources Corp. is headquartered in Halifax, Canada.

ECX-H.V.summary: EastCoal Inc. engages in the acquisition and development of mineral properties. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
